description.jp: 大空を自由に飛びまわる空賊に憧れるダルマスカ王国の孤児。兄を奪った帝国の支配を憎みながらも行動できず過ごしていたが 祖国解放を目指す王女アーシェと出会ったことから 運命は急転。幼馴染のパンネロや空賊バルフレアと共に 壮大な戦いに身を投じた。
description.gl: An orphan from the Kingdom of Dalmasca who dreams of becoming a sky pirate. While he despised the empire for taking his brother's life, he was helpless until a twist of fate brought him and Princess Ashe together. Along with his childhood friend, Penelo, and the sky pirate, Balthier, he sets out on a cosmic journey to free their homeland.

jp.text: オレぐらいになると\n脱け出すなんて簡単なんだよ
それはオレのもんだぜ！！
少しは不安だけどさ\nどんな奴か楽しみだよ
オレだってガキじゃないんだから\nもうわかってる
一緒に来たし\n一緒に行くんだ

gl.text: The Imperials'll need more than a dungeon to stop me.
Yeah、 I don't know what we'll find. I like it better that way.
Really、 it's all right. I know it wasn't your fault.
You'll make it. You got good friends.

rank_up_desc.gl:
When using Earthen Eruption (C):
 • 8-hit group magic BRV  attack + group HP  attack becomes 2-hit group magic BRV  attack + group HP  attack delivered 6 times; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 200%

 • Marginal special effect HP damage dealt effect boost
rank_up_desc.jp:
「グラウンドゼロ【C】」使用時
・8HIT全体魔法BRV攻撃＋全体HP攻撃が
　2HIT全体魔法BRV攻撃＋全体HP攻撃を6回行うに変化し
　合計BRV威力も極大アップ
・奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する
　上限は自身の最大BRVの200％分
・使用後特殊効果の最大BRVアップの効果小アップと
　奪ったBRVと加算したBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する上限アップと
　与えるHPダメージアップの効果極小アップ

name.jp: 恐れ知らずの少年エクステンド

desc.gl:
Earthen Eruption use +1

When using own abilities:
 • Lowers all enemies' resistance to Fire Ice Thunder Water Earth Wind Holy Dark (lowered resist does not stack)
*Also applies to abilities changed from BRV Attack, HP Attack

When using Earthen Eruption:
 • Grants Mist before attack
 • 8-hit group magic BRV attack + group HP attack becomes 2-hit group magic BRV attack + group HP attack delivered 6 times; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Self: 8 turns Flight to Freedom

Adds following effects to Mist:
 • Slightly raises own ATK
 • Own BRV will not decrease below 20% of MAX BRV (will not decrease further if already below 20%)

Adds following effects to Flight to Freedom:
 • Slightly raises own MAX BRV
 • Slightly raises own limit of BRV that may be stolen in excess of MAX BRV
 • Slightly increases own HP damage dealt
desc.jp:
「グラウンドゼロ」の使用回数＋1
